```tsx
import {
  Navigation,
  NavigationItem,
  NavigationHeading,
  NavigationSection,
  NavigationDivider,
} from "@fold-dev/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => (<View bgToken="surface-strong" p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem href="#">Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Products</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Analytics</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Subscriptions</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationHeading>Workspace</NavigationHeading>
            <NavigationItem>Settings</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Users</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationHeading>Account</NavigationHeading>
            <NavigationItem>Profile</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => (
    <View
        bgToken="surface-strong"
        p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem href="#">Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Products</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Analytics</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Subscriptions</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationHeading>Workspace</NavigationHeading>
            <NavigationItem>Settings</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Users</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationHeading>Account</NavigationHeading>
            <NavigationItem>Profile</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>
)
```
### States

export const States = () => (<View bgToken="surface-strong" p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem active>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem disabled>Products</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<States />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="States.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const States = () => (
    <View
        bgToken="surface-strong"
        p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem active>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem disabled>Products</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>
)
```
### Prefix And Suffix

export const PrefixAndSuffix = () => (<View bgToken="surface-strong" p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem prefix={<IconLib icon="circle"/>}>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem suffix={<Badge variant="danger"/>}>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem prefix={<IconLib icon="circle"/>} suffix={<IconLib icon="arrow-right"/>}>
                Products
            </NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<PrefixAndSuffix />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="PrefixAndSuffix.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const PrefixAndSuffix = () => (
    <View
        bgToken="surface-strong"
        p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem prefix={<IconLib icon="circle" />}>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem suffix={<Badge variant="danger" />}>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem
                prefix={<IconLib icon="circle" />}
                suffix={<IconLib icon="arrow-right" />}>
                Products
            </NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>
)
```
### Sub Navigation

export const SubNavigation = () => (<View bgToken="surface-strong" p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem suffix={<Pill size="xs" subtle>
                        UNREAD
                    </Pill>} subNavigation={<Navigation width={300}>
                        <NavigationItem suffix={<Badge variant="danger"/>}>Active</NavigationItem>
                        <NavigationItem>Inactive</NavigationItem>
                        <NavigationItem>Archived</NavigationItem>
                        <NavigationItem>Deleted</NavigationItem>
                    </Navigation>}>
                Projects
            </NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Products</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Analytics</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Subscriptions</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Settings</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Users</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Profile</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<SubNavigation />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="SubNavigation.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const SubNavigation = () => (
    <View
        bgToken="surface-strong"
        p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300}>
            <NavigationItem>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem
                suffix={
                    <Pill
                        size="xs"
                        subtle>
                        UNREAD
                    </Pill>
                }
                subNavigation={
                    <Navigation width={300}>
                        <NavigationItem suffix={<Badge variant="danger" />}>Active</NavigationItem>
                        <NavigationItem>Inactive</NavigationItem>
                        <NavigationItem>Archived</NavigationItem>
                        <NavigationItem>Deleted</NavigationItem>
                    </Navigation>
                }>
                Projects
            </NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Products</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Analytics</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Subscriptions</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Settings</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Users</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Profile</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>
)
```
### Nav Bar

export const NavBar = () => (<View bgToken="surface-strong" p={20}>
        <Navigation width={300} variant="navbar">
            <NavigationItem>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem active>Products</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Analytics</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Subscriptions</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationItem>Settings</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Users</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationItem>Profile</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>);

<div className="story-block">
<NavBar />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="NavBar.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const NavBar = () => (
    <View
        bgToken="surface-strong"
        p={20}>
        <Navigation
            width={300}
            variant="navbar">
            <NavigationItem>Dashboard</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Projects</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem active>Products</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Analytics</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Subscriptions</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationItem>Settings</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationItem>Users</NavigationItem>
            <NavigationDivider />
            <NavigationItem>Profile</NavigationItem>
        </Navigation>
    </View>
)
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
